description: USDT is a centralized stablecoin that mirrors the price of the U.S. dollar, issued by Hong Kong-based company Tether. The token’s peg to the USD is achieved via maintaining a sum of commercial paper, fiduciary deposits, cash, reserve repo notes, and treasury bills in reserves that is equal in USD value to the number of USDT in circulation.

en.description: USDT is a centralized stablecoin that mirrors the price of the U.S. dollar, issued by Hong Kong-based company Tether. The token’s peg to the USD is achieved via maintaining a sum of commercial paper, fiduciary deposits, cash, reserve repo notes, and treasury bills in reserves that is equal in USD value to the number of USDT in circulation.

fr.description: USDT is a centralized stablecoin that mirrors the price of the U.S. dollar, issued by Hong Kong-based company Tether. The token’s peg to the USD is achieved via maintaining a sum of commercial paper, fiduciary deposits, cash, reserve repo notes, and treasury bills in reserves that is equal in USD value to the number of USDT in circulation.

es.description: USDT es una moneda estable centralizada que refleja el precio del dólar estadounidense, emitida por la empresa Tether con sede en Hong Kong. La vinculación del token con el USD se logra mediante el mantenimiento de una suma de papel comercial, depósitos fiduciarios, efectivo, notas repo de reserva y letras del Tesoro en reservas que es igual en valor en USD al número de USDT en circulación.
